publicwhip.spmotion: * S2M-2944 Alex Neil:Diplomatic Snub to Norway—That the Parliament congratulates Norway on its 100 years of independence; notes the debate held on 8 June 2005 to mark this event; further notes that no member of the largest party in the Scottish Executive saw fit to attend and contribute to the debate, and conveys its apologies to the Norwegian ambassador, who was in attendance at the debate, and to the Norwegian Government for this snub.

S2M-2944 Alex Neil: Diplomatic Snub to Norway—That the Parliament congratulates Norway on its 100 years of independence; notes the debate held on 8 June 2005 to mark this event; further notes that no member of the largest party in the Scottish Executive saw fit to attend and contribute to the debate, and conveys its apologies to the Norwegian ambassador, who was in attendance at the debate, and to the Norwegian Government for this snub. Supported by: Campbell Martin*, Rosie Kane*, Brian Adam*, Patrick Harvie*, Mr Stewart Maxwell*, Jim Mather*, Margo MacDonald*, Fergus Ewing*, Christine Grahame*
S2M-2944 Diplomatic Snub to Norway (lodged on 9 June 2005) Bruce Crawford*, Dr Jean Turner*, Ms Sandra White*, Mrs Margaret Ewing*, Ms Rosemary Byrne*
S2M-2944 Diplomatic Snub to Norway (lodged on 9 June 2005) Tommy Sheridan*, Mr John Swinney*, Mr Brian Monteith*, Michael Matheson*
S2M-2944 Diplomatic Snub to Norway (lodged on 9 June 2005) Richard Lochhead*, Mr Adam Ingram*
S2M-2944 Diplomatic Snub to Norway (lodged on 9 June 2005) John Swinburne*
